name: shopsavr
description: ShopSavrâ„¢ - Intelligent Coupon & Deal Finder App

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter backend typecheck && pnpm --filter frontend typecheck

author: Joud Holdings, BidayaX, and Divitiae Good Doers Inc.

description: Automatically find and apply the best coupon codes while shopping online

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:extension
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:extension"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:extension
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:extension
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:extension
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:extension -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:extension
scripts.format:check: npm run format:backend -- --check && npm run format:frontend -- --check && npm run format:extension -- --check
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:extension
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:staging:backend && npm run deploy:staging:frontend
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:production:backend && npm run deploy:production:frontend
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=high && cd backend && npm audit --audit-level=high && cd ../frontend/web && npm audit --audit-level=high && cd ../extension && npm audit --audit-level=high
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd backend && npm audit fix && cd ../frontend/web && npm audit fix && cd ../extension && npm audit fix

author: ShopSavr Team <team@shopsavr.xyz>
